TopicTitle: How do I add mods others have created?

Articles.Content: I see that I can download the file but what do I do with it?

Most mods come with instructions. Possibly as a .txt file included in the downloaded file, or in the forum release thread, or on the "Installation" tab on the Spaceport page...Generally most get unzipped/extracted into the KSP_win/Gamedata folder....Thats usually all you have to do...
